com.jakubpetriska.gameengine.api

Interface Renderer


  • public interface Renderer
    Provides rendering functionality.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • onStartRenderingFrame

        void onStartRenderingFrame()
        Gets called by the engine before the rendering of a frame starts (calls to render(Model)).

        This ensures that all updates to game objects are applied for given frame.

      • render

        void render(MeshData mesh,
            Color color,
            Matrix44 transformation)
        Renders model.
        Parameters:
        mesh - Mesh to render.
        transformation - Transformation of the rendered object.

      • renderWireframe

        void renderWireframe(MeshData mesh,
                     Color color,
                     Matrix44 transformation)
        Renders wireframe of the given mesh. Use
        Parameters:
        mesh - Mesh to render.
        color - Color of the rendered wireframe.
        transformation - Transformation of the rendered object.

      • createMeshData

        MeshData createMeshData(float[] vertices,
                        float[] normals,
                        int[] trianglesVertices,
                        int[] trianglesNormals)
        Creates instance of MeshData with supplied data. Implementation can return a subclass of MeshData to which it can store it's specific data to use during rendering.

        Input parameters are similar to MeshData's fields.

      • setCamera

        void setCamera(Camera camera)

      • getCamera

        Camera getCamera()
